activity: LEVANTARSE (to get up) - Reflexive regular -AR. Practice all forms.
done_condition: when you've practiced conjugations for 5 minutes
prompt: Quiz me on the Spanish reflexive verb LEVANTARSE (to get up). Conjugate with reflexive pronouns: me levanto, te levantas, se levanta, nos levantamos, os levantáis, se levantan. Test me on presente, indefinido, imperfecto. Use Castilian Spanish with vosotros. One tense at a time, correct my mistakes.
